duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement authentic community engagement methods to address social inequities and improve neighborhood quality of life.
Coordinate workshops, public meetings, and recreational/educational events, and gather community feedback.
Use GIS software to visualize air quality data, create GIS project deliverables, and maintain monitors.
Build relationships with residents, strengthen community engagement, and support neighborhood initiatives.
Work on fellowship outreach efforts and support environmental and racial justice initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Community Development, Social Work, Urban Planning, or related field preferred.
